TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TicketCompatibilityMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义在 Forms 身份验证中对于票证到期日期使用协调世界时 (UTC) 还是本地时间。

span.span: Defines whether to use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or local time for the ticket expiration date for forms authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过使用协调世界时 (UTC) 或本地时间存储 ASP.NET 窗体身份验证的票证到期日期。The ticket expiration date for ASP.NET forms authentication can be stored by using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or the local time. 有关应用程序之间的兼容性和.NET Framework 的不同版本之间的兼容性，可以通过使用指定的票证过期时间`ticketCompatilityMode`元素的特性。For compatibility between applications, and for compatibility between different versions of the .NET Framework, the ticket expiration time can be specified by using the `ticketCompatilityMode` attribute of the element. 默认值为`ticketCompatibilityMode`属性是 Framework20。The default value for the `ticketCompatibilityMode` attribute is Framework20. ## Examples 下面的示例将窗体身份验证票证到期日期配置为 UTC 时间。The following example configures the forms authentication ticket expiration date as UTC time. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.TicketCompatibilityMode Framework20 = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定将票证到期日期存储为本地时间。

span.span: Specifies that the ticket expiration date is stored as local time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.TicketCompatibilityMode Framework40 = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定将票证到期日期存储为 UTC。

span.span: Specifies that the ticket expiration date is stored as UTC.
